thought: To craft a gray_carpet, I need to first craft two gray_wools, which require 1 gray_dye each. Gray dye can be crafted using 1 black_dye and 1 white_dye. I will first craft the white_dye, which can be crafted using a lily_of_the_valley. The lily_of_the_valley is located at slot 26, so I will move it to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1
